snippet.title: Day R Survival trailer ENG
snippet.description:
Can you survive in a destroyed after a nuclear war world? Radiation, hunger and diseases are all around you. Your goal is to cross the entire country and save your family. It is not exactly known if they're alive or radiation and the deadly virus have already reached them. Uncover the mystery of the apocalypse that happened and bring back lost memories while traveling across the vast territory of the USSR in the 80s.

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gm_shaber.dayr
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/ru/app/day-r-survival-%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B6%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5/id1060470475
